languages.text: Входить в разбуженный колдовством варп — практически безумие. Но столь могучий Навигатор, как Леди Кассия, способен уберечь корабль даже от ярости Имматериума.
To enter the warp stirred by sorcery would be madness, but a Navigator as powerful as Lady Cassia can keep a vessel safe even from the fury of the Immaterium.
languages.original_text: Входить в разбуженный колдовством варп — практически безумие. Но столь могучий Навигатор, как Леди Кассия, способен уберечь корабль даже от ярости Имматериума.

traits.locale_text: To enter the warp aroused by sorcery is madness. But a Navigator as powerful as Lady Cassia can keep a vessel safe even from the fury of the Immaterium.

To enter the warp stirred by sorcery would be madness, but a Navigator as powerful as Lady Cassia can keep a vessel safe even from the fury of the Immaterium.

languages.text: In den Warp zu fliegen, wäre Wahnsinn, aber eine Navigatorin wie Lady Cassia kann das Schiff selbst vor dem Zorn des Immateriums schützen.
languages.original_text: To enter the warp stirred by sorcery would be madness, but a Navigator as powerful as Lady Cassia can keep a vessel safe even from the fury of the Immaterium.

traits.locale_text: In den Warp zu fliegen, wäre Wahnsinn, aber eine Navigatorin wie Lady Cassia kann das Schiff selbst vor dem Zorn des Immateriums schützen.

languages.text: S'aventurer dans le Warp alors que la sorcellerie y fait rage serait pure folie, mais une navigatrice aussi puissante que dame Cassia peut préserver un vaisseau même face à la fureur de l'Immaterium.
languages.original_text: To enter the warp stirred by sorcery would be madness, but a Navigator as powerful as Lady Cassia can keep a vessel safe even from the fury of the Immaterium.

traits.locale_text: S'aventurer dans le Warp alors que la sorcellerie y fait rage serait pure folie, mais une navigatrice aussi puissante que dame Cassia peut préserver un vaisseau même face à la fureur de l'Immaterium.

languages.text: Entrar en la disformidad arremolinada por la brujería sería una locura, pero una Navegante tan poderosa como lady Cassia es capaz de proteger la nave contra la furia del Inmaterio.
languages.original_text: To enter the warp stirred by sorcery would be madness, but a Navigator as powerful as Lady Cassia can keep a vessel safe even from the fury of the Immaterium.

traits.locale_text: Entrar en la disformidad arremolinada por la brujería sería una locura, pero una Navegante tan poderosa como lady Cassia es capaz de proteger la nave contra la furia del Inmaterio.

languages.text: 魔力で刺激された<歪み>に入るのは狂気の沙汰だが、レディ・カシアほどの有能な航海士であれば、非物質世界の脅威にさらされようとも、船を安全に保てることだろう。
languages.original_text: To enter the warp stirred by sorcery would be madness, but a Navigator as powerful as Lady Cassia can keep a vessel safe even from the fury of the Immaterium.

traits.locale_text: 魔力で刺激された<歪み>に入るのは狂気の沙汰だが、レディ・カシアほどの有能な航海士であれば、非物質世界の脅威にさらされようとも、船を安全に保てることだろう。

languages.text: 巫术的力量撕开了亚空间，在这种情况下闯入亚空间无疑是失智之举。不过，若是有卡西娅女士这样强大的导航者在场，应该足以保护你的旗舰免受亚空间的怒火所伤。
languages.original_text: To enter the warp stirred by sorcery would be madness, but a Navigator as powerful as Lady Cassia can keep a vessel safe even from the fury of the Immaterium.

traits.locale_text: 巫术的力量撕开了亚空间，在这种情况下闯入亚空间无疑是失智之举。不过，若是有卡西娅女士这样强大的导航者在场，应该足以保护你的旗舰免受亚空间的怒火所伤。

languages.text: Sahirlikle çalkalanan öteboyuta girmek deliliktir. Ancak Leydi Cassia kadar güçlü bir Rotacı, gemiyi Tindiyar'ın öfkesinden bile koruyabilir.
languages.original_text: To enter the warp stirred by sorcery would be madness, but a Navigator as powerful as Lady Cassia can keep a vessel safe even from the fury of the Immaterium.
